Title: modern times
Director: Charles Chaplin
Released year: 1936
Certificate: G
Runtime: 87 min
Genre: Comedy, Drama, Family
Rating: 8.5
Overview: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless

Title: the great dictator
Director: Charles Chaplin
Released year: 1940
Certificate: G
Runtime: 125 min
Genre: Comedy, Drama, Romance
Rating: 8.4
Overview: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire, while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

Title: limelight
Director: Charles Chaplin
Released year: 1952
Certificate: G
Runtime: 137 min
Genre: Comedy, Drama, Romance
Rating: 8.3
Overview: A washed-up comedian helps a suicidal dancer find her way back to the stage and love.
